law.catch_line: A telephone company doing business in the State that has coin pay telephones located on outdoor site...

text.section: A telephone company doing business in the State that has coin pay telephones located on outdoor sites shall provide a method to place calls to the operator without requiring the insertion of coins into the telephone.
The cost of providing the method of placing calls required in subsection (a) of this section is a reasonable and necessary cost of providing telephone service.
